name: Webhook Agent
description: An A2A agent that forwards messages to webhook endpoints and returns responses in standard A2A format
author: Nasiko Team

skills.name: Webhook Proxy
skills.description: Forward messages to webhook endpoints and return responses
examples: Send a message to the webhook
Can you help me with my request?

webhook_url.description: The webhook URL to forward messages to

webhook_timeout.description: Timeout for webhook calls in seconds
